text: @IlhanMN @davidhogg111 ABSOLUTELY NOT.  Corona Virus i.e. Covid-19 medicine and treatments NEED to be for AMERICAN BORN AND RAISED Citizens ONLY !!! NOT undocumented people, immigrants, illegals or whatever you want to call these CRIMINALS... We can NOT RISK the chance of "running OUT".
